title: Nothing Phone 3A and 3A Pro at MWC 2025 Are Fun, Flashy and Affordable - CNET
description: With flashing lights, handy new AI-based tools and an approachable price, Nothing's new phones have a lot to offer. They make their debut at MWC 2025.

title: Users report emotional bonds with startlingly realistic AI voice demo - Ars Technica
description: Sesame’s new AI voice model features uncanny imperfections, and it’s willing to act like an angry boss.

title: Nvidia’s GeForce RTX 5070 Founders Edition cards won’t launch until later this month - The Verge
description: Nvidia says the GeForce RTX 5070 Founders Edition will be available “later in March.” Other RTX 5070 partner cards will be available beginning March 5th.

title: Andy Dunn’s new app Pie uses AI to help you make friends - TechCrunch
